info.title: Facebook Comments Scraper
info.description: Extract data from hundreds of Facebook comments from one or multiple Facebook posts. Get comment text, timestamp, likes count and basic commenter info. Download the data in JSON, CSV, Excel and use it in apps, spreadsheets, and reports.

resultsLimit.title: Results amount
resultsLimit.description: If this limit is not set as many results as possible are returned

includeNestedComments.title: Include comment replies
includeNestedComments.description: If checked, the actor will return up to 3 levels of comments/replies for each post. Note that each reply/comment will be returned as a separate result.

viewOption.title: Comments mode
viewOption.description: Choose the way the comments are sorted
